text: Kyzyl-Yar () is a rural locality (a village) in Yasherganovsky Selsoviet, Sterlibashevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 71 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 39 km from Sterlibashevo, 6 km from Yasherganovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlibashevsky District
title: Kyzyl-Yar, Sterlibashevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
